thread.subject: Summer Weekend Deal for Teams
thread.body:
Dear Emerald Plaza Team,

We are writing to inquire about your availability for our "Summer Weekend Deal for Teams" campaign.  We are a group of 20 and are interested in booking a weekend stay (Friday-Sunday, July 21st-23rd) at your hotel. We'd appreciate it if you could let us know the availability of your Deluxe Suites, including information on rates and any applicable conference room packages (ideally the 'Grand Ballroom').

Thank you for your time and consideration.

Sincerely,
The [Your Company Name] Team

thread.subject: Re: Summer Weekend Deal for Teams
thread.body:
Dear [Your Company Name] Team,

Thank you for your interest in Emerald Plaza. We do have availability for Deluxe Suites for the weekend of July 21st-23rd. We can accommodate your group of 20 comfortably. 

The Grand Ballroom is also available for your use during this period.  I've attached a detailed quote outlining rates for the suites and conference room package, including any applicable discounts for group bookings.

Please let me know if you have any questions.

Sincerely,
John Smith, Reservations Manager, Emerald Plaza Hotel

thread.subject: Re: Re: Summer Weekend Deal for Teams
thread.body:
Dear John Smith,

Thank you for the prompt response and the detailed quote.  We are very pleased with the offer and would like to proceed with the booking. Please let us know the next steps.

Sincerely,
The [Your Company Name] Team
